markdownRemark.html: This is a 27-hole course, consisting of 3 x 9 holes. Each of the three differs from the other. It's worth taking a buggy. The field is in very good condition. It's a fun golf course, with some holes that pose a challenge. The area and the surroundings are spectacular. There is a reasonably priced hotel with fair rooms, great food in room service good restaurants onsite.

frontmatter.title: Almenara Golf Hotel
frontmatter.description: Almenara Golf Hotel -  This is a 27-hole course, consisting of 3 x 9 holes. Each of the three differs from the other. It's worth taking a buggy. The field is in very good condition. It's a fun golf course, with some holes that pose a challenge. The area and the surroundings are spectacular. There is a reasonably priced hotel with fair rooms, great food in room service good restaurants onsite.
frontmatter.address: Avda. Almenara, s/n, Sotogrande, 11310 San Roque, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 65.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 65.00 euros
